#### =====BEFORE=====
**1) Describe the bug**

**2) What may be the root causes (prediction)?**

#### =====AFTER=====
**1) Describe the solutions (explain the root causes)**

**2) Pros and Cons of this solution**

**3) Are there any NEW (technical, code,...) ?**

**4) Is it challenging and difficult to do? Why?**

**5) Any other notes?**
